author: ianna
body:
- Remove Tracker overlap with Beampipe
- Use 2015 dev Castor as prod in 2017
- Add Pixel nose to 2017
- Synchronize all 2017 scenarios

Note: based on fully signed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/15833, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16050, and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16087
title: 2017 Overlaps Fix
